title: Lecture 1.1: What is React and JSX?
description: An introduction to the React library and the JSX syntax extension.

title: Lecture 1.2: Components and Props
description: Understanding functional components and how to pass data using props.

title: Lecture 1.3: Introduction to State and Events
description: Managing component state with useState and handling user events.

title: Lecture 2.1: Deep Dive into useEffect
description: Exploring the useEffect hook for side effects, cleanup, and dependencies.

title: Lecture 2.2: Managing Global State with useContext
description: Using the useContext hook to avoid prop drilling.

title: Lecture 1.1: Asynchronous JavaScript with Async/Await
description: Understanding promises and simplifying async code with async/await.
